#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ld long double
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;
ll right_[1001][1001];
ll left_[1001][1001];
ll up[1001][1001];
ll down[1001][1001];
void init(ll n,ll m)
{
	ll i,j;
	for(i=0;i<=n;i++)
	{
		for(j=0;j<=m;j++)
		{
			right_[i][j]=0;
			left_[i][j]=0;
			up[i][j]=0;
			down[i][j]=0;
		}
	}
}
ll ar[1001][1001];
int main()
{
	ll t;
	scanf("%lld",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		ll n,m;
		scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&m);
		ll i,j;
		init(n,m);
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<m;j++)
			{
				scanf("%lld",&ar[i][j]);
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			right_[i][m-1]=ar[i][m-1];
			for(j=m-2;j>=0;j--)
			{
				right_[i][j]=min(ar[i][j],ar[i][j]+right_[i][j+1]);
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			left_[i][0]=ar[i][0];
			for(j=1;j<m;j++)
			{
				left_[i][j]=min(ar[i][j],ar[i][j]+left_[i][j-1]);
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			down[n-1][i]=ar[n-1][i];
			for(j=n-2;j>=0;j--)
			{
				down[j][i]=min(ar[j][i],ar[j][i]+down[j+1][i]);
			}
		}
		for(i=0;i<m;i++)
		{
			up[0][i]=ar[0][i];
			for(j=1;j<n;j++)
			{
				up[j][i]=min(ar[j][i],ar[j][i]+up[j-1][i]);
			}
		}
		ll ans=100000000000000000L;
		for(i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			for(j=0;j<m;j++)
			{
				ans=min(ans,left_[i][j]+right_[i][j]+up[i][j]+down[i][j]-3*ar[i][j]);
			}
		}
		printf("%lld\n",ans);
	}
	return 0;
}
